ygData.subject: Spell List Update
ygData.msgSnippet: Spell Chart has again been updated Here is the link.  http://www.onelist.com/shareddir/eq_wizards/WizSpell0729.htm You may have to log into onelist before
ygData.messageBody:
Spell Chart has again been updated

Here is the link. http://www.onelist.com/shareddir/eq_wizards/WizSpell0729.htm

You may have to log into onelist before getting the file.

I also have a few quick questions.

#1 Can anybody tell me the damage and/or mana cost of the following spells
Level Spell
8 Fingers of fire
16 Project Lightning
20 Fire Spiral of Al'Kabor
24 Frost Shock
29 Thunder Strike
29 Shock Spiral of Al'Kabor
34 Thunder Clap
34 Circle of Force
34 Lava Storm
39 Force spiral of Al'Kabor
44 Frost Storm
49 Wrath of Al'Kabor
49 Super Nova

#2 Is there a place in Eurdin to buy spells other than the Library? They only
seem to have Mid to High Level Spells
#3 Is anybody willing to note the spells available in Nek.`? They don't like
gnomes very much :)
